name: Maidens Avatar Creator Deluxe
description: Create an avatar with over 900+ items and accessories to choose from. You can customize the stage as well as dress up the character. Make yourself, your friends, or a fantasy character with lots of different fashion style themes and trends like cute, classy, moe, anime, punk, rock, goth, lolita, RPG, etc. Tons of options to choose from. This game is great from kids up to adult it is very easy to play. You can save your creation to your computer.
